help_message.period:
Select Your Period.
An Example can be from November 1 2020 to December 1 2020
help_message.gen_method:
WEEKLY PATTERN: Provide a pattern for your shift, and the app will generate it for you for the period provided

UP TO YOU: Manual mode. From the period chosen, you will start from a empty schedule, and use the add button in the home screen.
help_message.pattern: Specify the part of the day for all the patter in the correct order. An example can be "afternoon", "morning" and the period. The app will generate for you all the correct schedule.

generic_messages.message_custom_shift: Set your own scheduler on the home view using the add button
generic_messages.select_period_shift: Please select the period of your shift

alert.erase_db: The app is update to the new version, and your data for the moment are over. We are working hard to provide a solution for the next updates
